FuncDef: The display mpls l2vpn qos command displays QoS information.
CLIs: display mpls l2vpn qos [ peer-address <peer-address> ] vc-id <vc-id> vc-type { ppp | hdlc | ethernet | vlan | atm-aal5-sdu | atm-trans-cell | atm-nto1-vcc | atm-nto1-vpc | atm-1to1-vcc | atm-1to1-vpc | atm-aal5-pdu | ip-interworking | ip-layer2 | satop-e1 | satop-t1 | satop-e3 | cesopsn-basic | cep }
display mpls l2vpn qos interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } [ secondary | bypass ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IPv4 address of a peer PE.
The value is an IPv4 address in dotted decimal notation (X.X.X.X), for example, 10.1.1.1.

Displays QoS information about a PW with the specified VC ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Displays QoS information about PWs with the specified encapsulation type.
-

PPP is a link layer protocol that specifies how to encapsulate and transmit network layer packets over P2P links.
-

HDLC is a bit-oriented link layer protocol.
-

This encapsulation type is used when Ethernet packets do not carry VLAN information.
-

This encapsulation type is used when Ethernet packets carry VLAN information.
-

One PW carries the AAL5 SDUs of one PVC.
-

ATM cells are transmitted over PWE3 VCs.
-

One PW carries the ATM cells of multiple PVCs.
-

One PW carries the ATM cells of multiple PVPs.
-

One PW carries the ATM cells of one PVC.
-

One PW carries the ATM cells of one PVP.
-

One PW carries the AAL5 PDUs of one PVC.
-

This encapsulation type is used for interworking between Huawei devices.
-

This encapsulation type is used for interworking between Huawei devices and non-Huawei devices.
-

SAToP is insensitive to the E1 frame structure and encapsulates a whole E1 frame into a PW packet.
-

SAToP is insensitive to the T1 frame structure and encapsulates a whole T1 frame into a PW packet.
-

SAToP is insensitive to the E3 frame structure and encapsulates a whole E3 frame into a PW packet.
-

CES is sensitive to E1 and T1 frame structures. E1 or T1 signals can be encapsulated into packets based on timeslots.
-

This encapsulation type is used for CEP services.
-

Displays QoS information about PWs that use the specified PW template.
The value is a string of 1 to 19 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.
The string can contain spaces if it is enclosed in double quotation marks (").

Displays QoS information about a PW with the specified AC interface.
-

Displays QoS information about a PW with the specified AC interface.
-

Displays QoS information about the secondary PW.
-

Displays QoS information about the bypass PW.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls l2vpn qos vc-id 100 vc-type vlan
Using VC ID 100 VC Type VLAN Display Local LDP QoS:
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The VPN services carried over a tunnel have different resource requirements. To meet the resource requirements of L2VPN services carried over a tunnel without affecting the quality of other VPN services, configure L2VPN QoS. To check QoS information about L2VPN after QoS is configured, run the display mpls l2vpn qos command.
